description:
If you have doubts as to whether you could create a website, let alone a website in one hour, then this course is for you. 

Businesses, freelancers and startups will find that this course offers the quickest way to get the results you need aka a published website that can be found in Google.

The checklist I used when creating this course was:

  • Make a course with a good pace
  • Don't miss anything
  • Use a steady step-by-step process
  • Total cost under $100
  • Teach students how to update their sites easily themselves
  • Make it easy for students to ask questions

---

This course lays out the steps for starting a website from choosing a theme through to adding a contact form.

This course will lead you step-by-step through the process of:

  • Choosing & customising a theme for your website
  • Choosing your website fonts
  • Adding pages to your website
  • Setting up your business blog
  • Updating your settings
  • Adding content
  • Linking social media
  • Adding a contact form & much more

---

This is a simple course that provides a step-by-step look at how you can set up your website in one hour. This course comes with a 30-day, no-questions-asked money-back guarantee. Feel free to ask for a refund if you're not able to get the basics of your site set up in one hour.

---

Have a question relating to the course? Message me here on Udemy and I'll be happy to help.
title: Build Your Business Website In 1 Hour
